content.text:
Let me analyze both structures in the main target image and provide assembly instructions for each.

Left Structure Analysis:
- Two layers
- 3 blocks total: 1 yellow curved piece (base), 1 green cube, and 1 blue cube on top

Right Structure Analysis:
- Three layers
- 4 blocks total: 2 orange cylinders (base), 1 yellow rectangular block (middle), and 1 blue cube on top

Assembly Instructions for Left Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 12 (yellow curved base)
    Step2: Move block with index 2 (green cube)
    Step3: Move block with index 1 (blue cube)
}

Assembly Instructions for Right Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 10 (orange cylinder)
    Step2: Move block with index 11 (orange cylinder)
    Step3: Move block with index 7 (yellow rectangular block)
    Step4: Move block with index 1 (blue cube)
}

The blocks have been selected to match exactly as they appear in the dictionary, maintaining their correct orientation and shape. Each structure is built from bottom to top to ensure stability.
